channel.title: Need server compiler help please
channel.description:
I know this is rather simple but I am not so good with compilers. My compiler does not work as my java is located in (Program files x86) This compiler is made for 32 bit I do believe. Here is my compiler. [code]@echo off title Compiler color 0a if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
Could someone please help 'convert' or modify this to work please?
My java is located: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java In the java folder I have: *jdk1.7.0_05 *jre6 *jre7
Thank you! :)

item.title: Need server compiler help please
item.dc:creator: @vyre-scape vyre-scape
item.description:
@vyre-scape wrote:

@echo off title Compiler color 0a if exist "Program files (x86)\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html :end echo Finished! pause exit

Try that, made it up real quick.

Read full topic

item.title: Need server compiler help please
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

Why don’t you make another compile based on your current version if you want? If you do, I’ll PM you on how you can.

Read full topic

item.title: Need server compiler help please

item.description:
@brynd63 wrote:

I know this is rather simple but I am not so good with compilers.
My compiler does not work as my java is located in (Program files x86)
This compiler is made for 32 bit I do believe.
Here is my compiler.

@echo off title Compiler color 0a if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html :end echo Finished! pause exit
